name: Sophia goes to get the book back
name_original: Sophia goes to get the book back
description:
There are people, who want to make an independend country Loscus a part of Great Empire. They burned down a library and stole an ancient book "Marichka and her pumpkin garden". Sophia goes to get it back but she has to deal with annoying quests.

Content warning: main character says mean words (but f-bombs are censored).

To play in English, select Налаштування and then press on the «Мова: Українська».
